body_html:
Thanks, @case540!

Not sure if it's related, but Horovod build fails with latest tf-nightly package due to missing Eigen headers:

  cc1plus: warning: command line option '-Wstrict-prototypes' is valid for C/ObjC but not for C++
  In file included from /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core/framework/numeric_types.h:20:0,
                   from /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.h:23,
                   from /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core/framework/op_kernel.h:23,
                   from horovod/tensorflow/mpi_ops.cc:23:
  /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/include/third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor:1:10: fatal error: unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor: No such file or directory
   #include "unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor"
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  compilation terminated.

Today:

./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180621.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180621.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/TensorSymmetry
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180621.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor

Yesterday:

./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/TensorSymmetry
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/TensorSymmetry
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/TensorSymmetry
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor

body:
Thanks, @case540!

Not sure if it's related, but Horovod build fails with latest `tf-nightly` package due to missing Eigen headers:

```
  cc1plus: warning: command line option '-Wstrict-prototypes' is valid for C/ObjC but not for C++
  In file included from /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core/framework/numeric_types.h:20:0,
                   from /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.h:23,
                   from /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core/framework/op_kernel.h:23,
                   from horovod/tensorflow/mpi_ops.cc:23:
  /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/include/third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor:1:10: fatal error: unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor: No such file or directory
   #include "unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor"
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  compilation terminated.
```

Today:
```
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180621.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180621.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/TensorSymmetry
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180621.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor
```

Yesterday:
```
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/TensorSymmetry
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/TensorSymmetry
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/tensorflow/include/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/TensorSymmetry
./tf_nightly-1.10.0.dev20180620.data/purelib/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor
```
